title: Reviewing ‘Maniac’ and ‘Forever,’ Plus Is the DC Extended Universe Cool Again? | The Watch (Ep. 292)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan talks with Alison Herman about Netflix’s ‘Maniac’ (5:09) and Amazon’s ‘Forever’ (23:20). Then he is joined by Jason Concepcion to talk about the expanding DC cinematic universe, including ‘Joker’ (33:58) and the new Harley Quinn movie ‘Birds of Prey’ (46:16).
Read Alison Herman on 'Maniac' here.
Read Alison Herman on 'Forever' here.
Read the Ringer Staff on 'Joker' here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
